Posts.Content: And it's a comedy!! Ladies: I'm a two-time survivor whose latest bout was with Stage 2 invasive BC in 2010. Had surgery, chemo, 7 weeks of radiation, Femara for 5 years. If you want a laugh or just see how someone else got through it, here's the link: Link removed You can download from Amazon FOR FREE over the next 2 days. Keep the faith -- you can do it!!! Amy ======
Posts.Title: NEW BOOK ABOUT BREAST CANCER from a survivor
